books.noResults.title: No books found
books.importExport.title: Import & Export
books.importExport.subtitle: Manage bulk book operations with CSV files
books.import.title: Import Books
books.import.subtitle: Upload a CSV file to add multiple books at once
books.import.template.title: Need a template?
books.import.template.description: Download our CSV template to ensure your file has the correct format.
books.import.process.title: Import Process
books.import.process.description: All records will be validated before import. If any record fails validation, the entire import will be cancelled. Check the template format carefully.
books.export.title: Export Catalog
books.export.subtitle: Download your library's book catalog as a CSV file
books.export.format.title: Export Format
books.export.format.description: The exported file will include all book information, inventory details, and copy information in a structured CSV format.
books.export.includes.title: Export includes:
books.importExport.instructions.title: CSV Format Instructions
books.importExport.instructions.required: authors - Author names separated by semicolons (required)
books.importExport.instructions.optional: totalCopies - Number of copies to create (default: 1)
shelfLocation - Default shelf location for copies
books.importExport.instructions.notes.va: All records must pass validation before any are imported
books.importExport.instructions.notes.is: ISBN-13 must be unique across your library
books.importExport.instructions.notes.se: Authors and categories should be separated by semicolons (;)
books.importExport.instructions.notes.ye: Published year must be a valid 4-digit year
books.importExport.instructions.notes.co: If totalCopies is specified, that many copies will be created automatically
